entry.title: Harvest - Golden Raisins - 5 Lbs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Harvest
Type: BAKING
Price: 29.99

Harvest - Golden Raisins - 5 Lbs

Snack or bake with these best quality Raisins!

Perfect for snacking or for use in cooking, baking, and even brewing. Trust the quality consistent product that's sure to please all of your patrons time and time again. Offering impeccable taste, feature a rich color. They have a long shelf life, don't need refrigeration, and are a healthy addition to your favorite foods.

Full of Nutrition

Having the Perfect taste, they also contain protein and healthy antioxidants to appease your more health-conscious patrons. In fact, they're an excellent, easy way to incorporate a serving of fruit into your most popular sweet treats. Sun-dried and bursting with flavor, sure to please no matter what you cook.

Versatile Ingredient

Perfectly dried having the natural taste. Serve them raw atop of your pastries, or use them for making raisin bars, Granola bars, cinnamon desserts, or ethnic curries. Packaged in a convenient packing, will last for multiple recipes in your busy restaurant..!
